title: How can I report a racist player?
body: His flame was so bad, how can I report him? And he thinks he will not get banned, he trust his unbanned past life. Looks like he does racism a lot.

replies.body:
Hey Fasmodey!

Please use the post-game report feature to report players who type negative/offensive comments in the post-game lobby. This way, there is more information the reform system can use to effectively and efficiently deal with negative players. The reporting system takes text from champion select lobby, in-game, and post-game into consideration, so you don't have to worry about that information being left out of the report. 

I'm sorry you encountered this negative player, and remember to press the report button for any negative players you encounter in the future! 

Thanks for your diligence!

Hey Fasmodey, 

The best thing you and your team can do is report the negative player at the end of the game. Riot is working on new ways to make sure toxic players like this get punished in chat restrictions. http://riot.com/1OJwJVE This will give you more information and help you understand that your reports on negative behavior are not in vain! 


Keep up the good work and stay positive.
